== Terminal Spec ==

=== User Story #1 Clipboard ===
As a technical user I want to run commands and copy the results from the terminal to another application

==== Functional Definition ====
* Method for highlighting sections of text in the terminal
* Optional: Highlight text off-screen in the buffer
